str2: Each (of more than two), every one. As if a superlative of hekas; each or every.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From dokimos; to test; by implication, to approve.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular

str2: From a primary ergo; toil; by implication, an act.
Then, at that time. From ho and hote; the when, i.e. At the time that.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
A boasting; a ground of boasting (glorying, exultation). From kauchaomai; a boast in a good or a bad sense.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular

str2: Only, solitary, desolate. Probably from meno; remaining, i.e. Sole or single; by implication, mere.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
(a) of two: another, a second, (b) other, different, (c) one's neighbor. Of uncertain affinity; other or different.
